articles.author: Alisha Ebrahimji
articles.title: 3 Palestinian college students were shot on a walk in Vermont – where their relatives thought they’d be safe - CNN
articles.description: Their families thought the three Palestinian college students who’d grown up like brothers would be safer in the United States – certainly in Vermont, celebrating a classic American holiday among loved ones – than back in Israeli-occupied Ramallah.
